attributes.action: create more youth centres for young people aged 12-18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that each borough should have at least 5 youth centres. Children need places to socialise, meet people, have fun, live a healthy lifestyle and join clubs to learn new skills outside school time. Teenagers need to be kept off the streets to stop them turning to crime and vandalism.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
